--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> Rodimus gestures to Remus, signaling him to fall back.
> 
> Rodimus: The same deal with you Scourge. You are out of place. Fall
> back.
> 
> Rodimus then gets the comm message from Nightlight. He opens the
> comm.
> 
> Rodimus: Rodimus here, Nightlight. Stand by.

For a moment Scourge doesn't budge, until after a gesture from Cyclonus
he begins to back off. If Remus does the same then Scourge continues
until he is at a protective but not immedietly dangerous distance. 

Around and out to the side the sweeps fly, also somewwhat back from to
the gladiators (Cyclonus & Rodimus) and thier seconds (Scourge &
Remus). 

OOC: The sweeps have not cut off approach as they are not making any
aggressive movements, but it may make some folks nervous if they choose
to fly through. They can of course choose to go around.

Preston
(Da'minion)
